headline: Bank of America Outlook After CEO Succession News and 36% Twelve Month Share Price Surge
summary: Deciding what to do with Bank of America stock these days is a bit like picking a lane in busy traffic. Do you ride the momentum, or is it time to hit the brakes? The past year has rewarded patience in a big way. Shares have soared by 35.6% over the last twelve months and an even more eye-catching 143.6% across the last five years. Even so, the path has not been all smooth. After a modest 3.6% bump over the last month, the stock has barely budged in the last week, down just 0.1%. Year to...
